headline.main: U.S. Aid Given Free French; Ban Is Put on Vichy Africa; U.S. AID GIVEN TO FREE FRENCH

lead_paragraph: Extension of American lease-lend aid to the armies of General Charles de Gaulle in Africa and Syria was announced here yesterday by the Free French delegation to the United States. Simultaneously, it was made known in Washington that the Economic Defense Board, without explaining its reasons, had revoked all export licenses for French North Africa, together with all permits for exportation of petroleum products to Spain and Tangier.
abstract: Roosevelt extends aid to all Free French territory; Free French NYC hdqrs pub text of lr to Stettinius authorizing retransfers by Brit; Econ Defense Bd evokes licenses for shipments to Vichy-controlled Africa
